Attributes.description: Introduction to systems thinking and resilience to understand dynamics of social change and innovation; use of case studies to demonstrate applications of different types of ecological knowledge, including traditional knowledge and experiential knowledge. Part of the Haida Gwaii Fall Semester.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: All of HGSE 355, HGSE 356, HGSE 357, HGSE 359.
